document_data.title: Abandoned village
document_data.name: Hethridge Drop
document_data.mainbody:
'''Hethridge Drop''' was an abandoned village on the [[Evermoors]], about four miles northeast of [[Nesmé]]. It was abandoned prior to [[1374 DR]].{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|20}}
